verbs.description: Jim Carrey [V: has] taken trolling to a whole new artistic level . He first started by poking fun at White House press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders . On Wednesday he revealed his latest painting on Twitter , this time trolling Dr. Harold Bornstein , Donald Trump 's personal physician who was " dictated " into calling Trump “ the healthiest individual ever elected , ”
